sys_script_include.description: Script Include to check if all teams have joine din or not
sys_script_include.name: CheckLoggedInTeams

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_a311ed0347a402100e63e481e36d434f
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_540166_apl.CheckLoggedInTeams</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Script Include to check if all teams have joine din or not</description><name>CheckLoggedInTeams</name><script><![CDATA[var CheckLoggedInTeams = Class.create();
CheckLoggedInTeams.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {
  },

  // Function to check if all teams have logged in
  checkAllTeamsLoggedIn: function() {
    var teamTable = new GlideRecord('x_540166_apl_team_table');
    teamTable.query();

    while (teamTable.next()) {
      var teamId = teamTable.sys_id.toString();

      var loggedInTeams = new GlideRecord('x_540166_apl_apl_check_logged_in_teams');
      loggedInTeams.addQuery('team_id', teamId);
      loggedInTeams.query();

      // Check if there is a record for the team in the 'x_540166_apl_apl_check_logged_in_teams' table
      if (!loggedInTeams.hasNext()) {
        return false; // If any team is not logged in, return false
      }
    }

    return true; // All teams are logged in
  },

  type: 'CheckLoggedInTeams'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>maulik</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-28 15:48:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>a311ed0347a402100e63e481e36d434f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CheckLoggedInTeams</sys_name><sys_package display_value="APL " source="x_540166_apl">3c7b4b44471002100e63e481e36d43e5</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="APL ">3c7b4b44471002100e63e481e36d43e5</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_a311ed0347a402100e63e481e36d434f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>maulik</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-28 15:48:10</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
